attributes.action: Annually Survey The Population For Their Opinion On Important Issues
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It should be possible to set up a survey, to be run annually, to ask the population which direction they want the Government to head in on various issues.

An anonymous survey covering issues such as education, health, immigration, transport and every other topic would give everyone a voice and give the Government some sense of direction on major issues.

A similar setup to general elections could be used, allowing people to complete the survey in person or by post. The data collected should be made publically available, giving a true picture of what people want and whether the Government is following that.
